author: University of Portsmouth
title: Experts call for science-driven holistic approach in global plastic treaty talks
description: A holistic approach backed by science is vital to a successful UN Global Plastics Treaty, explained Professor Steve Fletcher, Director of the Revolution Plastics Institute at the University of Portsmouth in an editorial published in Science on 10 January 2025.
